- e represents an eye or sphere:

  - e [gas spore](/wiki/Gas_spore "Gas spore")
  - e [floating eye](/wiki/Floating_eye "Floating eye")
  - e [freezing sphere](/wiki/Freezing_sphere "Freezing sphere")
  - e [flaming sphere](/wiki/Flaming_sphere "Flaming sphere")
  - e [shocking sphere](/wiki/Shocking_sphere "Shocking sphere")

- E represents an [elemental](/wiki/Elemental "Elemental"):

  - E [stalker](/wiki/Stalker "Stalker")
  - E [air elemental](/wiki/Air_elemental "Air elemental")
  - E [fire elemental](/wiki/Fire_elemental "Fire elemental")
  - E [earth elemental](/wiki/Earth_elemental "Earth elemental")
  - E [water elemental](/wiki/Water_elemental "Water elemental")

- Press [e]() to [eat](/wiki/Eat "Eat").

- Press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [e]() to [engrave](/wiki/Engrave "Engrave") something on the ground.

- Press [alt](/wiki/Alt "Alt") + [e]() to [enhance](/wiki/Enhance "Enhance") your weapons skill.

- **E** is often used as a shorthand for [Elbereth](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth"), for example "You can E with a wand of fire".

## Variants

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") introduces new creatures that use the e glyph:

- e eye or sphere:

  - e [glowing eye](/wiki/Glowing_eye "Glowing eye")
  - e [bloodshot eye](/wiki/Bloodshot_eye "Bloodshot eye")
  - e [blinking eye](/wiki/Blinking_eye "Blinking eye")
  - e [Beholder](/wiki/Beholder_\(monster\) "Beholder (monster)")

### UnNetHack

[UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack") also has a different set of creatures from vanilla that use the e glyph:

- e eye or sphere:

  - e evil eye
  - e dungeon fern spore
  - e arctic fern spore
  - e blazing fern spore
  - e swamp fern spore
  - e fern spore
  - Floating eyes use the same glyph with a different color: e

There is also a new function that uses the [E]() key:

- Press [Ctrl](/wiki/Ctrl "Ctrl") + [E]() to instantly engrave Elbereth in the dust.

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.](/images/5/57/Nh366-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.")

  • e represents an eye or sphere:
    • e gas spore
    • e floating eye
    • e freezing sphere
    • e flaming sphere
    • e shocking sphere
  • E represents an elemental:
    • E stalker
    • E air elemental
    • E fire elemental
    • E earth elemental
    • E water elemental
  • Press e to eat.
  • Press shift + e to engrave something on the ground.
  • Press alt + e to enhance your weapons skill.
  • E is often used as a shorthand for Elbereth, for example "You can E with a wand of fire".

Variants

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM introduces new creatures that use the e glyph:

  • e eye or sphere:
    • e glowing eye
    • e bloodshot eye
    • e blinking eye
    • e Beholder

UnNetHack

UnNetHack also has a different set of creatures from vanilla that use the e glyph:

  • e eye or sphere:
    • e evil eye
    • e dungeon fern spore
    • e arctic fern spore
    • e blazing fern spore
    • e swamp fern spore
    • e fern spore
    • Floating eyes use the same glyph with a different color: e

There is also a new function that uses the E key:

  • Press Ctrl + E to instantly engrave Elbereth in the dust.
